synopsis.text: Shizuku Ishiai is a middle school student who loves to dance, but struggles to express herself openly. Using the alias "Ai," she secretly uploads videos of herself dancing while dressed as a boy to the popular website Smile Douga. Her videos gain popularity, and she declares fellow viral dancer Hayate, known as the "dancing prince," as her rival. However, after an unexpected series of events, Shizuku's cross-dressing dance videos catch the attention of a talent agency. She makes her professional debut by joining an all-male idol dance group alongside none other than her rival, Hayate. Forced to share close quarters with him, Shizuku must keep her identity secret while navigating a complicated relationship with Hayate, who starts to develop feelings for her feminine side. As Ai and Hayate continue their friendly rivalry through dance, Shizuku walks a fine line struggling between her blossoming career, an evolving romance, and concealing her true self from her fans and colleagues.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
